attributes.action: Support the work of Undercover Journalists and grant the CPS further powers to use evidence obtained by Undercover Journalists
attributes.additional_details:
This is an online petition that is asking for the Ministry of justice to address the following:
The work of undercover Journalists gathering evidence to be used in a Court of Law.
Making the evidence obtained by Undercover Journalists more easily admissible in a Court of Law.
Enabling Undercover Journalists to conduct their duties without fear and with the full protection and cooperation of the Law and Justice system.
